Action.author: amber.zhang
Action.body: INFO 018 0m MSP PeerOrg1 validating identity Will checked that the MSP code and in the *peer* logs this is still at INFO level : 2017-05-15 16:40:18.390 UTC msp DeserializeIdentity -> INFO 1d66ab2 0m Obtaining identity but the validate one in the peer logs should be gone in alpha2 forward. >
